title: Pipeline Zebrabox Treatment
text: Working with the Zebrabox to monitor Daphnia magna behaviour, i began developing a pipeline for automatic high-troughput analysis.

title: About me
text: I am a PhD student in ecotoxicology and environmental chemistry, investigating the toxicity of both untreated and advanced oxidation-processed nanoplastics and microplastics—whether alone or in combination with emerging co-contaminants—on aquatic organisms such as Daphnia magna and Chlamydomonas reinhardtii. Additionally, I manage data processing, visualization and produce visually engaging reports using Quarto.
